details.name: Sukhwarjhar to Dharmapur Moishkhuti MEM road, PMGSY Pkg No.AS-01-273

details.name: NH15 to Bandia
details.remarks: As per report received from PWRD the NH15 to Bandiai road is submerged due to flood water and the approx. length of submergence is 1.4km. Dated 01/09/2023.

details.name: DRDA to Mowamari
details.remarks: As per report received from PWRD the DRDA to Mowamari road is submerged due to flood water and the approx. length of submergence is 1.5km. Dated 01/09/2023.
